subject: Djinn
text:
Haunted, they say, believing
the soft, shifty
dunes are made up
of false promises.

Many believe   
whatever happens   
is the other half
of a conversation.

Many whisper
white lies
to the dead.

'The boys are doing really well.'

Some think
nothing is so
until it has been witnessed.

They believe
the bits are iffy;

the forces that bind them,
absolute.
